QuestData.Title: Jarl Come Back Now
QuestData.Description: You seem to follow my commands well, $n. Perhaps I can use you again.$B$BJarl Throndyr, the leader of Jandvik, has been missing for some time now. I assume that he has fallen in battle to the invading Sashj'tar naga, but I must know for certain.$B$BFind out what has become of him.$B$BDo this task for me and I can assure you that my vrykul will not harm you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Jarl Throndyr in Azuregale Bay.
QuestData.RewardText: <Throndyr mutters through shallow breaths.>$B$BPoison... runs through... my body.
